sentence: (N) 7 and 10 a.m. CNN Sunday Morning Futures With Maria Bartiromo Rep. Jim Jordan (R-Ohio); U.S. Senate candidate Herschel Walker (R-Ga.); House Minority Leader Rep. Kevin McCarthy (R-Bakersfield); U.S. House candidate Cory Mills (R-Fla.).
author: Ed Stockly
title: Guests on Sunday Talk Shows: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky will be on 60 Minutes
